text: Peasants Front of Indonesia () was a peasant mass organisation connected to the Communist Party of Indonesia (PKI). BTI was founded 25 November 1945. The previous peasant organisation of PKI had been the Peasants Union (Serikat Tani) formed in 1945. The organization struggled for land reform, and was suppressed along with PKI in 1965. Category:Mass organizations of the Communist Party of Indonesia Category:1966 disestablishments in Indonesia Category:1945 establishments in Indonesia
title: Peasants Front of Indonesia
